page.title: 06 A Typical School Day
page.content: On a{school day}I get up at 8.00. My alarm wakes me up and I get washed, clean my teeth and get dressed. I go downstairs and I have cereals for breakfast and a cup of tea. Then I go outside and feed the fish with special fish food and I go to school for my {education.} We line up in the playground when the bell goes. We come in at 9.15 and we have assembly. We have break time at 10.30 and we have 20 minutes to play and to eat crisps then we come in. We have quiet reading at 12.00 and we go in to dinner at 12.15. At 1.15 we come in and have afternoon lessons. At 3.15 I go home and I have some sweets and watch the television or I go out to play with my friends. When my dad comes home from work I go in for tea and go to bed at 9.00.
